testcase.name: Free CRM deals page scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login page.........................................passed When title of login page....................................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user moves to deals page...............................................passed Then user enters the deals details..........................................passed Then user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then user closes browser....................................................passed
